typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Bakery, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe in the old town center with stylish interior, half-open kitchen. Offers a variety of tea, coffee, and other beverages including plant milk option. Has breakfast all day, freshly made cakes, salads, and soups. A seasonal menu offers additional food like ratatouille, etc. Vegan and vegetarian food is marked. WLAN for free.
